Text: MORE AUDIT STUFF FLETCHER CHALLENGE PETROLEUM INC Cc Fletcher Challenge Petroleum Inc and ENA CP Contract It looks like the Counterparty group inactivated this counterparty in their system effective due to a name change to Fletcher Challenge Energy Canada Inc but I cant find any documentation on this so we still have an active contract in Global Can you all shed any light on this as to whether or not this CPs contract should be terminated thanks again g Georgi Landau Enron Net Works Ph Fx

MORE AUDIT STUFF Cc Pioneer Energy Marketing Company Inc CP Contract The CP system shows this CP was inactivated on Counterpartys comments are There was a name change from Aurora Natural Gas Associated Products LLC that record existed in GCP as a source record but has been inactivated Golden Prairie Resources LLC was created as a result of that name change and Pioneer was sold to Golden Prairie Effective have documents in hand Do you know anything about this Can this contract be terminated Union Pacific Railroad Company CP Contract The CP system shows this CP as inactivated on Counterpartys comments are This record is suspended until when it will be inactivated This CP merged with Southern pacific Transportation Company effective Southern Pacific was the survivor and on the same day changed its name to Union pacific Railroad Company The name change was overlaid on the old Southern Pacific record which created active records ino Union Pacific Railroad Company Do you know anything about this Can this contract be terminated Vitol Gas Electric LLC CP Contract The CP system shows this CP as Suspended Counterpartys comments are Suspended record per credit request Trades now through Avista Energy Inc per personnel at Vitol and Avista Changed world patent link since Avista Energy Inc purchased Vitol Do you know anything about this suspension Is it okay to suspend their contract also Merrill Lynch International Bank CP Contract The CP system shows this CP as Suspended Counterpartys comments are Record suspended with credits OK pending inactivation Per Leslie Campbell Credit no contracts are attached to this record All business will be conducted ino Merrill Lynch International Bank Ltd New York Agent CP ID Per Jorge Garcia ENA FX this is actually a name change I will verify and request documents Do you know anything about this suspension Is it okay to suspend their contract also Georgi Landau Enron Net Works Ph Fx
Out of Office AutoReply Johns ManvilleI will be out of the office all day on October th and the morning of October th For assistance contact Anthony Campos at Thanks Georgi Landau

RE OUTSTANDING COUNTERPARTIES Cc I also noticed on Inland Paperboard and Packaging IncENA CP we are still waiting for the executed agreement since July th Is it normal for a company to take this long to return the executed agreement We have set up a global contract number to allow them to do online trading Georgi Landau Enron Net Works Ph Fx Original Message From Landau Georgi Sent Monday October AM To Bailey Susan Boyd Samantha Heard Marie Jones Tana Panus Stephanie Cc Richardson Stacey Subject OUTSTANDING COUNTERPARTIES In reviewing my outstanding file folder the following counterparties are still unfinished yet in the Financial Lotus Notes Database their documents have been executed Please let me know when we can expect to receive the executed documents for final processing Enron Metall Recycling GmbH Co KGRMT CP Enron Metals Commodity LimitedRMT CP Grupo Minsa SA de CVENA CP Quark power LLCENA CP Smith Barney AAA Energy Fund LPENA CP XL Trading Partners LtdENA CP Thanks georgi Georgi Landau Enron Net Works Ph Fx

RE Virginia Power Energy Marketing IncFYI Contract number is Contract date is CP number is g Georgi Landau Enron Net Works Ph Fx Original Message From Heard Marie SentThursday September PM ToAllen Kimberly Anderson Diane Bailey Susan Bell Jean Bowen B ob Boyd Samantha Brackett Debbie R Bradford William S Brewer Juli e Brown Angela Y Campos Anthony Cason Sharen Cisneros Celeste Col bert Marilyn Conwell Wendy Cook Mary Crawford Sharon Curry Ken Eb ow Amber Ellstrom Diane Espinoza Veronica Fischer Jason Garcia Jor ge A Gerard Camille Gonzalez Veronica Gray Barbara N Hare Bill D Heaney Gordon Hendry Brent Hundl Kimberly Hunter Larry Joe Johns on Cheryl Johnson Rudwell Jones Tana Koehler Anne C Lambert Karen Landau Georgi Landry Shemeika S Lebrocq Wendi Lees Lisa Leite F rancisco Pinto Mendoza Nidia Monterrey Maribel Moore Jason Moran To m Mulvany Patrick Murphy Melissa Ann Nelson Cheryl Neuner Dale Ngo Tracy Ornelas Bianca Otto Randy Panus Stephanie Piwetz Stephanie Radous Paul Rajaram Aparna Reeves Leslie Richardson Stacey Rodrigu ez Bernice Rodriguez Melissa Rohauer Tanya Sacks Edward Sayre Fran k Schott Samuel Seib Dianne Sever Stephanie Shackleton Sara Shiver s Lynn Sietzema Linda Sonnonstine Max Southard Carrie Tackett Scot t Taylor Mark E Legal Theriot Kim S Vanek Darren Williams Jason R Credit Williams Tiffany SubjectVirginia Power Energy Marketing Inc We have received an executed First Amendment to ISDA Master Agreement da ted as of September by and between Virginia Power Energy Marketing Inc and Enron North America Corp This first amendment increases the co llateral thresholds for both Party A and Party B Copies will be distributed

rush approvals EOLtwo counterparties have been checked and Profile Manager has been updated Georgi Forwarded by Georgi LandauNAEnron on PM Anthony CT PM To Georgi NRON cc Kelly nron Subject rush approvals EOL FYI Forwarded by Anthony CamposHOUECT on PM From Tana Jones on PM To Karen CT Anthony CT cc Stephanie CT Subject rush approvals EOL Ive gotten some calls from the business people who want to trade with two counterparties right away One is Michigan Consolidated Gas Company which is on the list for the th and the other is Mobil Oil Corporation Supply Distribution which is on the list of the th Can you please make sure the individuals in Global Contracts responsible for these counterparties update them today Our business people would be most appreciative

Re FW Please Approve New Product Type US Steel Hot Rolled Plate Financial Swap Cc Georgi From Karen CT on AM To Lisa nronXgate ENRON cc Tana CT Kelly nron Stephanie NRON Anthony CT Georgi NRON Subject Re FW Please Approve New Product Type US Steel Hot Rolled Plate Financial Swap Global acknowledges From Lisa nronXgate on PM To Tana CT Karen CT Kelly nron cc Stephanie nronXgate Subject FW Please Approve New Product Type US Steel Hot Rolled Plate Financial Swap Please acknowledge your agreement to the copying of profiles as shown directly below Please respond by am on Wednesday May Thank you Original Message From Moran Tom Sent Monday April PM To Lees Lisa Sever Stephanie Cc Guidroz Walter Subject FW Please Approve New Product Type US Steel Hot Rolled Plate Financial Swap Lisa Stephanie Please copy the existing counterparty profile from US Steel Hot Rolled Fin Swap and utilize it for this new product US Steel Hot Rolled Plate Fin Swap Regards tm Original Message From Cass Robert B Sent Monday April PM To Taylor Mark Blumenthal Jeff Taylor Mark Musch Susan Gockerman Matthew F Hayden Frank Herod Brenda F Moran Tom Hagelmann Bjorn Roenz Manfred Cc Lees Lisa Sever Stephanie Jones Tana Lambert Karen Sweitzer Tara Kenne Dawn C Moorer Torrey Meredith Kevin Lozano Melba Walker Chris Alatorre Carlos Carter Carl Subject Please Approve New Product Type US Steel Hot Rolled Plate Financial Swap Please approve the following product type in Datamanager after am See the steps for approval below US Steel Hot Rolled Plate Fin Swap Website Short Description of Product Type US HR Plate Swap US Steel Hot Rolled Plate Fin Swap Product Type A US Hot Rolled Steel Plate financial Swap Transaction with Enron North America Corp under which the Seller pays a Floating Price and the Buyer pays the price submitted by the Counterparty on the Website the Fixed Price in each case in respect of the Notional Quantity per Determination Period Each calendar month during the Term of the Transaction will be a Determination Period provided that if the Term of the Transaction is less than one calendar month the Determination Period shall be the Term of the Transaction The Notional Quantity per Determination Period shall be the volume submitted by the Counterparty via the Website The Payment Dates will be business days after the Floating Price is determinable The Floating Price shall be the Index for the relevant Determination Period Reference Period The term of the Transaction shall be from the Effective Date to the Termination Date The Effective Date is and the Termination Date is Product Additional Information example The Index for a Determination Period shall be the average price for Domestic Midwest Plate net ton in the table US Current Forecast Prices under the current months heading in the monthly issue of MBR Metal Bulletin Research North American Steel Markets Monthly with the published month the same as the Determination Period Currency The price is quoted in US Dollars per unit of volume which will be the Contractual Currency Unit of Measure The unit of measure against which the price is quoted shall be net tons lbs and the quantity shown shall be in net tons per month The financial GTCs are attached as follows STEPS FOR APPROVAL click the START button select PROGRAMS select TEST APPLICATIONS select ENRONONLINE CLUSTERPROD PROCEED WITH USUAL LOGINPASSWORD click the Enron Online Production Cluster START button select EnronOnLine this is the EOL Datamanager PROCEED WITH EOL LOGINPASSWORD click on the for EnronOnLine click on the for Product Types click on the for Awaiting Approval OR Partially Approved select the product requiring review as stated in email above Right mouse click on properties to view product setup TO APPROVE Right mouse click on Approved

Re FW FX Top Counterparties Cc Since I am not quite sure of what is being requested below I am attaching a spread sheet with information pulled from Global concerning these counterparties Please review my spread sheet especially the counterparties in bold Let me know if you need additional information Thanks Georgi ext From Karen CT on PM To Anthony CT Georgi NRON cc Kelly nron Subject FW FX Top Counterparties Please review and forward comments Forwarded by Karen LambertHOUECT on PM From Stephanie nronXgate on AM To Kelly nron Karen CT Tom nronXgate cc Lisa nronXgate Subject FW FX Top Counterparties Per Legal we will not be able to copy profiles for the new Financial Currency Swap The list below is the top Please review for this product type Let me know if you have any questions Thanks Stephanie Original Message From Alatorre Carlos Sent Tuesday May PM To Jones Tana Cc Lees Lisa Sever Stephanie Subject FX Top Counterparties Please see below list of Top counterparties to have access to FX product Please let me know if you have any questionscomments Thanks Carlos

Re FW Can Gas Fin Opt Put Call please process Cc Financials Georgi From Karen CT on AM To Lisa nronXgate ENRON cc Tana CT Kelly nron Stephanie NRON Georgi NRON Anthony CT Subject Re FW Can Gas Fin Opt Put Call please process Yes Global agrees From Lisa nronXgate on AM To Tana CT Karen CT Kelly nron cc Stephanie nronXgate Subject FW Can Gas Fin Opt Put Call please process The product long descriptions in the attachment directly below will fall under the new product types CAN Gas Financial Option Call and CAN Gas Financial Option Put Credit Tom Moran has approved copying the profiles for the new product type from the following CAN Gas Financial Swap Please respond no later than am on Wednesday May Thank you Original Message From Lozano Melba Sent Wednesday May PM To Lees Lisa Sever Stephanie Cc Cass Robert B Walker Chris Meredith Kevin Draper Lon Subject Can Gas Fin Opt Put Call please process LisaStephanie Can Gas Fin Opt Call Can Gas Fin Opt Put Was uploaded a couple of weeks ago as an internal product They have not created any products under them Lon Draper in Canada wants to upload the following profile if its ok with Legal and Credit Let me know what you find out Thanks Melba Product Type name Can Gas Fin Opt Call GTC Same as Can Gas Fin Swap Profile Copy external profiles Bid offer tenor investment grade flag masters from Can Gas Fin Swap EXCLUDE BROKERSBroker Master Users Broker Sub Users from file upload Product Type name Can Gas Fin Opt Put GTC Same as Can Gas Fin Swap Profile Copy external profiles Bid offer tenor investment grade flag masters from Can Gas Fin Swap EXCLUDE BROKERSBroker Master Users Broker Sub Users from file upload

COUNTERPARTIES NOT IN THE FINANCIAL TRACKING SYSTEM Cc I am working on a financial contract audit and could not find any records in the Financial Lotus Notes Tracking system for the following counterparties I was able to pull and make copies of the executed agreements from your legal files last week and I am sending them to the file room to be scanned into Livelink and properly filed Since the Financial tracking system is one of our means of verifying information would you please populate this information in it If any of these counterparties are not active I will need to know that information also Counterparty Name Enron Entity Contract Date CP ID No Global Contract No ECT Strategic Value Corp ECT now ENA Enron Finance Corp Enron Corp Joint Energy Development Investments Limited Partnership ERMS now ENA Joint Energy Development Investments II Limited Partnership ECT now ENA Lomax Exploration Company JEDI Louisiana Land and Exploration Company The ERMS now ENA Methanex Corporation ECT Canada WausauMosinee Paper Corporation ECT now ENA Please call me at if you have any questions Thanks Georgi Georgi Landau Enron Net Works Ph Fx

MERCATOR ENERGY INCORPORATED and ENERGY WEST INCORPORATEDPlease check your records and let me know if you have any kind of documentation evidencing a merger indicating that Mercator Energy Incorporated merged with and into Energy West Incorporated I am unable to find anything to substantiate this information Thanks for your help Georgi Landau Enron Net Works Ph Fx

LOUIS DREYFUS ENERGY CORP and CMIThe Counterparty System indicates that Louis Dreyfus Energy Corp CP and CP were made inactive There is no reference to any other counterparty in the way of a merger amalgamation etc Can you verify this information because we have an active contract in Global between Louis Dreyfus Energy Corp and CMI K Thanks for all your help Georgi Landau Enron Net Works Ph Fx

MORGAN STANLEY CAPITAL GROUP INC Cc I am still working on this audit and I have found in Legals Financial Lotus Notes tracking system that Morgan Stanley Capital Group Inc created by Lisa Wheeler on the status says Draft Sent It should be changed to Executed since there is an executed copy of their Master Energy Price Swap Agreement in Livelink This particular Morgan Stanleys Contract number is CP Let me know if you have any questions g Georgi Landau Enron Net Works Ph Fx

BERCO RESOURCES INC Cc Berco Resources Inc K CP ID The Counterparty system indicates that this counterparty was suspended on Cheryl Johnsons Counterparty Group comments state Spoke to Bill Bergner who states that he has sent documentation to legal regarding the conversion He said they did business under a group of different entities other than Inc In Jan they combined those entities to form the LLC so it wasnt a simple conversion per se He also stated that this entity should be deleted inactivated as there will be no business conducted in that name This record will be suspended pending inactivation Does anyone in legal know anything about this because we do have an active contract in the contract system This is part of the contract audit Ive been working on Thanks g Georgi Landau Enron Net Works Ph Fx

Original Message From Moran Tom Sent Monday April PM To Lees Lisa Sever Stephanie Cc Guidroz Walter Subject FW Please Approve New Product Type US Steel Hot Rolled Plate Financial Swap Lisa Stephanie Please copy the existing counterparty profile from US Steel Hot Rolled Fin Swap and utilize it for this new product US Steel Hot Rolled Plate Fin Swap Regards tm Original Message From Cass Robert B Sent Monday April PM To Taylor Mark Blumenthal Jeff Taylor Mark Musch Susan Gockerman Matthew F Hayden Frank Herod Brenda F Moran Tom Hagelmann Bjorn Roenz Manfred Cc Lees Lisa Sever Stephanie Jones Tana Lambert Karen Sweitzer Tara Kenne Dawn C Moorer Torrey Meredith Kevin Lozano Melba Walker Chris Alatorre Carlos Carter Carl Subject Please Approve New Product Type US Steel Hot Rolled Plate Financial Swap Please approve the following product type in Datamanager after am See the steps for approval below US Steel Hot Rolled Plate Fin Swap Website Short Description of Product Type US HR Plate Swap US Steel Hot Rolled Plate Fin Swap Product Type A US Hot Rolled Steel Plate financial Swap Transaction with Enron North America Corp under which the Seller pays a Floating Price and the Buyer pays the price submitted by the Counterparty on the Website the Fixed Price in each case in respect of the Notional Quantity per Determination Period Each calendar month during the Term of the Transaction will be a Determination Period provided that if the Term of the Transaction is less than one calendar month the Determination Period shall be the Term of the Transaction The Notional Quantity per Determination Period shall be the volume submitted by the Counterparty via the Website The Payment Dates will be business days after the Floating Price is determinable The Floating Price shall be the Index for the relevant Determination Period Reference Period The term of the Transaction shall be from the Effective Date to the Termination Date The Effective Date is and the Termination Date is Product Additional Information example The Index for a Determination Period shall be the average price for Domestic Midwest Plate net ton in the table US Current Forecast Prices under the current months heading in the monthly issue of MBR Metal Bulletin Research North American Steel Markets Monthly with the published month the same as the Determination Period Currency The price is quoted in US Dollars per unit of volume which will be the Contractual Currency Unit of Measure The unit of measure against which the price is quoted shall be net tons lbs and the quantity shown shall be in net tons per month The financial GTCs are attached as follows STEPS FOR APPROVAL click the START button select PROGRAMS select TEST APPLICATIONS select ENRONONLINE CLUSTERPROD PROCEED WITH USUAL LOGINPASSWORD click the Enron Online Production Cluster START button select EnronOnLine this is the EOL Datamanager PROCEED WITH EOL LOGINPASSWORD click on the for EnronOnLine click on the for Product Types click on the for Awaiting Approval OR Partially Approved select the product requiring review as stated in email above Right mouse click on properties to view product setup TO APPROVE Right mouse click on Approved
